LastInsertID() uint64 // LastInsertID is the last inserted

item.title: High Performance TiDB Lesson 03：通过工具寻找 TiDB 瓶颈
item.description: 测试 1 2 3 4 5 cd /data/tidb/src/github.com/pingcap/go-ycsb ./bin/go-ycsb load mysql -P ./workloads/workloade -p recordcount=300000 -p mysql.host=127.0.0.1 -p mysql.port=4000 -p mysql.user=root -p mysql.password=123456 -p mysql.db=test --threads 3 ./bin/go-ycsb run mysql -P ./workloads/workloade -p recordcount=300000 -p mysql.host=127.0.0.1 -p mysql.port=4000 -p mysql.user=root -p mysql.password=123456 -p mysql.db=test --threads 3 问题 解决方案 巨人的肩膀 http://stormluke.me/ycsb-hbase-readme/ 进展 0% https://asktug.com/t/topic/2641 进展 0% https://pingcap.com/blog-cn/pcp-report-202002/ 进展 0%
